name: Spaghetti Carbonara
ingredients: Pasta, eggs, pancetta, Parmesan cheese, black pepper
cooking_method: Boil pasta, cook pancetta, mix with eggs and cheese

name: Margherita Pizza
ingredients: Pizza dough, tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, basil
cooking_method: Spread sauce on dough, add cheese and basil, bake

name: Tiramisu
ingredients: Savoiardi biscuits, coffee, mascarpone cheese, eggs, sugar, cocoa powder
cooking_method: Dip biscuits in coffee, layer with cheese mixture, sprinkle cocoa

name: Lasagna
ingredients: Lasagna noodles, ground beef, tomatoes, ricotta cheese, mozzarella cheese
cooking_method: Cook beef and tomatoes, layer with noodles and cheese, bake

name: Minestrone Soup
ingredients: Vegetable broth, carrots, celery, zucchini, beans, pasta
cooking_method: Cook vegetables and pasta in broth, season with herbs

name: Bruschetta
ingredients: Bread, tomatoes, garlic, olive oil, basil
cooking_method: Grill bread, top with tomato mixture and herbs

name: Risotto
ingredients: Arborio rice, onion, white wine, chicken broth, Parmesan cheese
cooking_method: Cook onion and rice in wine and broth, stir in cheese

name: Osso Buco
ingredients: Veal shanks, onion, carrots, celery, tomatoes, white wine
cooking_method: Brown meat, cook with vegetables and wine, braise

name: Fettuccine Alfredo
ingredients: Fettuccine pasta, butter, Parmesan cheese, heavy cream
cooking_method: Cook pasta, melt butter and cheese with cream, mix with pasta

name: Caprese Salad
ingredients: Tomatoes, fresh mozzarella cheese, basil, balsamic vinegar
cooking_method: Layer tomato and cheese slices, sprinkle with herbs and vinegar

name: Pesto Sauce
ingredients: Basil, pine nuts, Parmesan cheese, garlic, olive oil
cooking_method: Blend ingredients in food processor, serve with pasta or bread
